enhanced_by.reason: The classNames() method is used to retrieve the current set of class names, which is necessary for the removal operation.
The attributes() method is used to access the attributes of the element, which includes the class attribute that needs to be modified.
The hasClass(String) method can be used to verify that the specified class name has been successfully removed from the element.
The classNames() method can be used to verify the updated set of class names after the removal operation.
